lexUnit.name: leave.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: let remain in another place as abondoned

sentence.text: True to wild-West stereotypes , Stewart was slain by a neighboring farmer , leaving his strong-willed wife , Helen , to assume the duties of the ranch .
, High Holborn , had been left behind .
When his companion and he had fled to some prearranged retreat - already occupied , no doubt by a confederate - the companion had persuaded him to leave so compromising an article of furniture .

Idly , David leafed through the list of functions , pleasures and invitations which Carole had left on her bedside table .
He went through to the kitchen and opened the booze cupboard , ignoring the brandy bottle that Cally had left on the table .
Who knows , if the Gauguins were left on the island one day they might be worth -- '' I drew a breath -- ` twenty or even thirty thousand each ? ''
